attributes.action: Delete the Thames Crossing Tolls at Dartford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I understand that the Dartford Tunnel and Queen Elizabeth Bridge construction costs have been paid up for a few years.
The Toll booths are a bottle-neck to free traffic flow and cause serious hold-ups in both directions, last Nov it took 2 hours from the M20 to the Toll booths a distance of about 5 miles.
The pollution to the local area from fumes, clutch and brake dust(high asbestos content) and noise is not acceptable environmentally. 
I propose that the existing 50mph speed limits be rigorously enforced for safety reasons
